name: Well, @Hulu has been an absolutely terrible experience for watching the Oscars. I pay for no ads, but I get them. Audio gets out of sync. I get “playing this part of the video isn’t allowed” when attempting to rewind. Trash.

content.html: Well, @Hulu has been an absolutely terrible experience for watching the Oscars. I pay for no ads, but I get them. Audio gets out of sync. I get “playing this part of the video isn’t allowed” when attempting to rewind. Trash.

summary: Apologies for any trouble or confusion! Live streaming will include the same # of ads as traditional cable since it's streaming live from the network. Due to streaming rights, rw isn't available on the Oscars. You can watch the Oscars on-demand though after it finishes airing.

content.html:
Audio and video are out of sync watching the Oscars.

Seems very odd to see the mouth forming words and hearing them later.
@hulu @kellylcampbell

summary: When I’m pausing while watching live, I should be able to fast forward through commercials in my buffer. Point blank. Period. Anything less is inferior to traditional cable.

content.html: When I’m pausing while watching live, I should be able to fast forward through commercials in my buffer. Point blank. Period. Anything less is inferior to traditional cable.
